title: Less Annoying Grandmaster Chess Player In My Reccomended Section

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player to duel via. Blitz chess (3m) on lichess.org during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During the following night, you will... well, duel the chosen player in a Blitz chess match (3m) on lichess.org. This somehow takes up the night, roleblocking them.
> If you win this match, you will deal a Powerful attack to them.
> If you lose this match, you are yourself dealt a Powerful Attack.
> If it's a draw, do another match, 5head.
- The link to the chess match's replay will be sent in the graveyard w/ the message of whomever died in the duel, if any.

- This role may be rerolled into another Town Killing role for free. You're welcome.
